data.convo: Hello , this is Catharine from Thomson Company . Can I speak to Mr . Wang ? Sorry , he is in the middle of something . Can I take a message ? Yes . Please tell him that he is expected to have an interview with the CEO of ABC company tomorrow morning at 10:00 . Could you please speak in a louder voice ? There may be something wrong with your receiver . OK , I will repeat what I said loudly .
